 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָחַח‎</span>] **verb** ==be dazzling== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַחְצַח‎</span> ***polish***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be scorched***, Aph\`el ***declare in writing*** (make clear), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***clarus, lucidus, fulgidus***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***smooth, plain***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַחוּ מֵחָלָב‎</span> [[Lam.4.7|Lam 4:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַכּוּ מִשֶּׁלֶג‎</span>), ***they are more dazzling*** (i.e. ***whiter***) ***than milk*** (of effeminate skin).
